original_text:
God has turned me over to the ungodly
    and thrown me into the clutches of the wicked.
korean_text: 하나님이 나를 악인에게 넘기시며 행악자의 손에 던지셨구나

sentences.original_text: God has turned me over to the ungodly
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 나를 경건하지 않은 자들에게 넘기셨다

sentences.original_text: and thrown me into the clutches of the wicked
